item.title: Research
item.description: An Introduction to Rcpp Modules This is a talk I gave at the UseR! 2022 Conference. It covers the essentials on how to expose C++ classes to R using Rcpp Modules. Presentations: UseR! High-Resolution Peak Demand Estimation Using Generalized Additive Models and Deep Neural Networks, 2022, Jonathan Berrisch & Michal Narajewski & Florian Ziel This paper presents a method for estimating high-resolution electricity peak demand given lower resolution data. Paper: Pre-Print

item.title: Pre-specified variables as default arguments in Rcpp(armadillo)
